segments.text: Good morning . Are you ready to order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am , thank you . I'll have three scrambled eggs with country ham , toast and jam , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like anything to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have a tomato juice and some iced tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I have a slice of pumpkin pie ?
segments.speaker: S2
